text: Tot, kto uveroval v voskreseniye, stremitsya k nagrazhdeniyu Allakha i boitsya Yego nakazaniya, verit iskrenne. Pust' on tvorit dobryye deyaniya, ved' predopredelonnyy Allakhom Den' nepremenno nastupit. Allakh - Slyshashchiy i Vedayushchiy! On slyshit rechi Svoikh rabov, znayet ikh deyaniya i vozdast kazhdomu po zaslugam
